author: Global Witness

resources.name: DRC Timber Trade Tracker Exports 2013 - Q4 2016

name: drc-timber-tracker-data
notes: This data is visualised on the [DRC Timber Trade Tracker](http://globalwitness.org/drctimbertracker). The data is based on the best available data (albeit incomplete) and are calculations based on data from DRC’s Direction générale des douanes et accises and the Office Congolaise de Contrôle. These have been checked for consistency against other sources of trade data such as Eurostat, PIERS and General Administration of Customs of the People's Republic of China. The data is updated on a quarterly basis. Figures are in Roundwood Equivalent (RWE), a measure to account for the volume of roundwood (logs) used to produce exported sawn wood – calculated to combine sawn timber and logs exports in one figure (see also [http://www.globaltimber.org.uk/rwevolume.htm](http://www.globaltimber.org.uk/rwevolume.htm)). Please note that figures are displayed in the English numeral system.
title: DRC Timber Trade Tracker Data
